item.title: GitHub
item.description: Activate pages -Repository -> Settings -> Options -> GitHub Pages Actions (workflow) Create file : .github/workflows/workflow.yml Example (auto build hugo static site generator on push) : name: CI on: push jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-18.04 steps: - name: Git checkout uses: actions/checkout@v2 - name: Update theme run: git submodule update --init --recursive - name: Setup hugo uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2 - name: Build run: hugo - name: Deploy uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: personal_token: ${{ secrets.
